meanings.definition: The style or manner of writing or printing.
meanings.sent1: The newspaper had a unique charactery that made it stand out.
meanings.sent2: The font's charactery was elegant and easy to read.
meanings.sent3: The printer's charactery was so fancy, it looked like art!
meanings.sent4: Her handwriting had a charactery that danced across the page.
meanings.sent5: The charactery of the book cover drew me in with its bold design.

meanings.definition: The distinctive qualities or features of a person or thing.
meanings.sent1: The puppy's playful charactery brightened everyone's day.
meanings.sent2: The charactery of the old house gave it a mysterious charm.
meanings.sent3: The cake's charactery was so sweet, it seemed to smile back at me.
meanings.sent4: His charactery shone through in his kind gestures towards others.
meanings.sent5: The charactery of the mountain range was breathtaking in its grandeur.
